scripts.run:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android
scripts.generate:android:signing-key: keytool -genkey -v -keystore example.keystore -alias example -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 && mv example.keystore android/app
scripts.generate:android:apk: npm run generate:android:bundle && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.extract:docker:apk: docker create -ti --name text-gradient-android-container text-gradient-android.image /bin/bash && docker cp text-gradient-android-container:/package/TextGradientExample/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk text-gradient.apk && docker rm -fv text-gradient-android-container
scripts.build:release:docker: npm run build:docker:image && npm run extract:docker:apk
